name: Ode to Passage
simple_desc: Effective for the entire battle. When used on Tribbie, causes DMG dealt by Tribbie to ignore enemies' DEF. When Tribbie launches Follow-Up ATK and triggers the Additional DMG from Tribbie's Zone, it further deals 1 instance(s) of Additional DMG.
desc: Effective for the entire battle. When used on Tribbie, causes DMG dealt by Tribbie to ignore #2[i]% of enemies' DEF. When Tribbie launches Follow-Up ATK and triggers the Additional DMG from Tribbie's Zone, it further deals #1[i] instance(s) of Additional DMG.
